section.title: incidents creating new priorities for Incident and To-Do Priority
section.para: To create a new Priority, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Priority, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Priority (e.g., High, Medium, Low, etc.).
Specify the order in which the Priority should appear when using the drop-down list on the Incident screen.
Enter a brief description of the Incident Priority.
